title: Full Coverage: The Bondi Beach Hanukkah Terror Attack | 9 News Australia
description: As the sun was setting on Sunday, two gunmen, a father and son, opened fire as families gathered to celebrate the Jewish Festival of Lights. Fifteen innocent lives were taken, and more than 40 people were injured. Among the dead were a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl.  9 News Australia reports on the devastating Bondi Beach terror attack that claimed 15 innocent lives during Hanukkah celebrations. Two gunmen, a father and son, opened fire in a horrific nine-minute ordeal. This special coverage details the timeline, the heroic actions of bystander Ahmed El Ahmed who disarmed a shooter, and tributes to the victims, including 10-year-old Matilda Brittvan. NSW Premier Chris Minns joins live as a grieving nation mourns. | *Subscribe and ðŸ””: http://9Soci.al/KM6e50GjSK9*  CHAPTERS | KEY MOMENTS IN THIS VIDEO 0:00 Breaking News: 15 Dead in Bondi Terror Attack 0:35 9 Minutes of Horror: The Attack Timeline 1:17 Gunmen Position on the Bridge 2:14 Hero Bystander Ahmed El Ahmed Disarms Gunman 3:07 Police Shootout & Pipe Bomb Discovery 5:54 Police Commissioner & PM Anthony Albanese Statements 7:05 "Numbers Became Names": Remembering the Victims 8:46 Live Interview: NSW Premier Chris Minns 10:37 Tributes to Matilda Brittvan & Rabbi Eli Schlanger 12:43 Investigation: The Father & Son Shooters 14:36 Update on Injured Police Officers 16:20 Crisis Support Centre at Coogee  *Get more breaking news at 9News.com.au: http://9Soci.al/iyCO50GjSK6*  FOLLOW 9News Australia â–º Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/9News/ â–º Twitter: https://twitter.com/9NewsAUS â–º Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/9news/  Join 9News for the latest in news and events that affect you in your local city, as well as news from across Australia and the world.  #9News #BreakingNews #NineNewsAustralia #9NewsAU
